class

build::JdkTask

sys::Obj
  build::Task
    build::JdkTask

Java Developer Kit task provides a common set of environment variables for the Java environment.

Slots

jarExeSource

Str jarExe

Jar (Java Archive) executable: {jdkBinDir}/jar

javaExeSource

Str javaExe

Java runtime executable: {jdkBinDir}/java

javacExeSource

Str javacExe

Javac compiler executable: {jdkBinDir}/javac

jdkBinDirSource

File jdkBinDir

JDK bin for executables: {jdkHomeDir}/bin/

jdkHomeDirSource

File jdkHomeDir

Home directory for jdk installation configured via config prop jdkHome

makeSource

new make(BuildScript script)

Initialize the JDK environment fields.

rtJarSource

File rtJar

Standard runtime library jar file: {jdkHomeDir}/jre/lib/rt.jar

runSource

override Void run()

Overrides build::Task.run

Run not implemented
